abstract.para: These functions report and upgrade PostGIS versions.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Packages and upgrades PostGIS extensions (e.g. postgis_raster, postgis_topology, postgis_sfcgal) to given or latest version.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Packages and upgrades PostGIS extensions to given or latest version. Only extensions you have installed in the database will be packaged and upgraded if needed. Reports full PostGIS version and build configuration infos after. This is short-hand for doing multiple CREATE EXTENSION .. FROM unpackaged and ALTER EXTENSION .. UPDATE for each PostGIS extension. Currently only tries to upgrade extensions postgis, postgis_raster, postgis_sfcgal, postgis_topology, and postgis_tiger_geocoder.
Availability: 2.5.0

note.para: Changed: 3.3.0 support for upgrades from any PostGIS version. Does not work on all systems.
Changed: 3.0.0 to repackage loose extensions and support postgis_raster.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.screen:
NOTICE: Packaging extension postgis NOTICE: Packaging extension postgis_raster NOTICE: Packaging extension postgis_sfcgal NOTICE: Extension postgis_topology is not available or not packagable for some reason NOTICE: Extension postgis_tiger_geocoder is not available or not packagable for some reason
postgis_extensions_upgrade ------------------------------------------------------------------- Upgrade completed, run SELECT postgis_full_version(); for details (1 row)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Reports full PostGIS version and build configuration infos.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Reports full PostGIS version and build configuration infos. Also informs about synchronization between libraries and scripts suggesting upgrades as needed.
Enhanced: 3.4.0 now includes extra PROJ configurations NETWORK_ENABLED, URL_ENDPOINT and DATABASE_PATH of proj.db location

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: SELECT PostGIS_Full_Version(); postgis_full_version ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- POSTGIS="3.4.0dev 3.3.0rc2-993-g61bdf43a7" [EXTENSION] PGSQL="160" GEOS="3.12.0dev-CAPI-1.18.0" SFCGAL="1.3.8" PROJ="7.2.1 NETWORK_ENABLED=OFF URL_ENDPOINT=https://cdn.proj.org USER_WRITABLE_DIRECTORY=/tmp/proj DATABASE_PATH=/usr/share/proj/proj.db" GDAL="GDAL 3.2.2, released 2021/03/05" LIBXML="2.9.10" LIBJSON="0.15" LIBPROTOBUF="1.3.3" WAGYU="0.5.0 (Internal)" TOPOLOGY RASTER (1 row)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the GEOS library.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the GEOS library, or NULL if GEOS support is not enabled.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the GEOS library against which PostGIS was built.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the GEOS library, or against which PostGIS was built.
Availability: 3.4.0

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the liblwgeom library. This should match the version of PostGIS.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the liblwgeom library/

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the libxml2 library.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the LibXML2 library.
Availability: 1.5

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns build date of the PostGIS library.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns build date of the PostGIS library.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the PostGIS library.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the PostGIS library.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the PROJ4 library.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the PROJ library and some configuration options of proj.
Enhanced: 3.4.0 now includes NETWORK_ENABLED, URL_ENDPOINT and DATABASE_PATH of proj.db location

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: SELECT PostGIS_PROJ_Version(); postgis_proj_version ------------------------- 7.2.1 NETWORK_ENABLED=OFF URL_ENDPOINT=https://cdn.proj.org USER_WRITABLE_DIRECTORY=/tmp/proj DATABASE_PATH=/usr/share/proj/proj.db (1 row)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the PROJ library against which PostGIS was built.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the PROJ library, or against which PostGIS was built.
Availability: 3.5.0

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the internal Wagyu library.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the internal Wagyu library, or NULL if Wagyu support is not enabled.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns build date of the PostGIS scripts.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns build date of the PostGIS scripts.
Availability: 1.0.0RC1

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns version of the PostGIS scripts installed in this database.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns version of the PostGIS scripts installed in this database.

note.para:
If the output of this function doesn't match the output of
you probably missed to properly upgrade an existing database. See the Upgrading section for more info.

refsection.para: Availability: 0.9.0

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version number of the postgis.sql script released with the installed PostGIS lib.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the version number of the postgis.sql script released with the installed PostGIS lib.

note.para: Starting with version 1.1.0 this function returns the same value of . Kept for backward compatibility.

refsection.para: Availability: 0.9.0

refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns PostGIS version number and compile-time options.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns PostGIS version number and compile-time options.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: SELECT PostGIS_Version(); postgis_version --------------------------------------- 3.4 USE_GEOS=1 USE_PROJ=1 USE_STATS=1 (1 row)
